languages.text: "Выжечь из памяти соратника? Даже если бы так велел долг, я бы не хотел забывать арбитров, с которыми сражался бок о бок. И уж точно не стал бы делать этого ради сомнительного знания, каких бы благ оно ни сулило".

"You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."
languages.original_text: "Выжечь из памяти соратника? Даже если бы так велел долг, я бы не хотел забывать арбитров, с которыми сражался бок о бок. И уж точно не стал бы делать этого ради сомнительного знания, каких бы благ оно ни сулило".

traits.locale_text: "You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget Arbitrators with whom I fought side by side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised."

"You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget Arbitrators with whom I fought side by side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised."

"You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

"You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

"You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

"You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

languages.text: “你销毁了关于同伴的记忆？换做是我，即便是职责所在，我也一点都不想忘记与我并肩作战的法务官同伴。而且，我绝对不会为了某些可疑的知识这么做，哪怕它能给我带来再多好处，我也绝不会考虑。”
languages.original_text: "You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

traits.locale_text: “你销毁了关于同伴的记忆？换做是我，即便是职责所在，我也一点都不想忘记与我并肩作战的法务官同伴。而且，我绝对不会为了某些可疑的知识这么做，哪怕它能给我带来再多好处，我也绝不会考虑。”

languages.text: «¿Quemó el recuerdo de su camarada? Aunque mi deber lo exigiera, no querría olvidar a un Arbitrator que hubiera luchado a mi lado. Y, desde luego, no lo haría a cambio de un dudoso conocimiento, independientemente de las ventajas que me prometiera».
languages.original_text: "You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quemó el recuerdo de su camarada? Aunque mi deber lo exigiera, no querría olvidar a un Arbitrator que hubiera luchado a mi lado. Y, desde luego, no lo haría a cambio de un dudoso conocimiento, independientemente de las ventajas que me prometiera».

languages.text: « Vous avez brûlé le souvenir de votre camarade ? Même si mon devoir l'exigeait, cela me coûterait d'oublier un arbitrator qui a combattu à mes côtés. Et je n'accepterais certainement pas un tel sacrifice en échange d'un savoir douteux, qu'importe les avantages qu'il pourrait me procurer. »
languages.original_text: "You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez brûlé le souvenir de votre camarade ? Même si mon devoir l'exigeait, cela me coûterait d'oublier un arbitrator qui a combattu à mes côtés. Et je n'accepterais certainement pas un tel sacrifice en échange d'un savoir douteux, qu'importe les avantages qu'il pourrait me procurer. »

languages.text: 「仲間の記憶を焼き払ったのですか？たとえ義務で必要だったとしても、共に戦ったアービトレイターを忘れたいとは思いません。ましてや、どんな利益を約束されようと、怪しげな知識のために、決してそんなことはしないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

traits.locale_text: 「仲間の記憶を焼き払ったのですか？たとえ義務で必要だったとしても、共に戦ったアービトレイターを忘れたいとは思いません。ましてや、どんな利益を約束されようと、怪しげな知識のために、決してそんなことはしないでしょう」

languages.text: "Yoldaşının anısını yaktın mı? Görevim bunu gerektirse bile yanımda savaşan bir Yargıcı'yı unutmak istemezdim. Hem de şüpheli bir bilgi uğruna... Bana ne faydalar vaat ederse etsin, bunu kesinlikle yapmazdım."
languages.original_text: "You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

traits.locale_text: "Yoldaşının anısını yaktın mı? Görevim bunu gerektirse bile yanımda savaşan bir Yargıcı'yı unutmak istemezdim. Hem de şüpheli bir bilgi uğruna... Bana ne faydalar vaat ederse etsin, bunu kesinlikle yapmazdım."

languages.text: "Ihr habt die Erinnerung an Euren Kameraden ausgebrannt? Selbst wenn die Pflicht es von mir verlangte, würde ich keinen Arbitrator vergessen wollen, der an meiner Seite gekämpft hat. Und schon gar nicht für irgendein dubioses Wissen, ganz gleich, welche Vorteile es mir verspricht."
languages.original_text: "You burned away the memory of your comrade? Even if my duty demanded it, I would not want to forget an Arbitrator who fought by my side. And I certainly wouldn't do so for the sake of some dubious knowledge, no matter what benefits it promised me."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt die Erinnerung an Euren Kameraden ausgebrannt? Selbst wenn die Pflicht es von mir verlangte, würde ich keinen Arbitrator vergessen wollen, der an meiner Seite gekämpft hat. Und schon gar nicht für irgendein dubioses Wissen, ganz gleich, welche Vorteile es mir verspricht."
